sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

about us

Are you bored of the same cocktails? The cocktail App is here to help you! Sometimes all you need is a good drink and some music.

You don't drink alcohol? No problem at all, we also have delicious non-alcoholic cocktail options. If you like our app, please share with your friends!

Feel free to explore our cocktails, we will give you all the details you need to prepare the best drink you ever had! Cheers!

) } export default About
